title: Cracking the Vault

panel_structure.description: The Architect surrounded by scattered coins of philosophical concepts, reading notes with genuine excitement. Each coin glows with a different profound question. Evan stands puzzled by the fuss.
Close-up of the coins—'Player or Game?', 'Dreamer or Dream?', 'Subject or Process?'—scattered like everyday pocket change. Some coins worn smooth from handling, others still sharp with fresh insight.

transformation_notes: This scene celebrates how Evan handles ultimate questions with everyday ease. The vault metaphor shows philosophy returning from academic exile to common wonder.
dialogue_rhythm: From recognition to celebration to humble puzzlement
narrator_role: Celebrating the democratization of deep thought
